content.en: What's an allergy? It's when your body touches something and your body doesn't like it. Your body tries to fight it.
content.tw: 什麼是過敏? 當你的身體接觸到不喜歡的東西時，它會反抗，產生過敏反應。

content.en: People can have allergies to many things - plants, animals, and more.
content.tw: 人們會對許多事物過敏——植物、動物等等。

content.en: Some allergies are not bad. They make you itch. They make you sneeze. But they won't kill you! Some allergies can be very dangerous! People with bad allergies need to be very careful!
content.tw: 有一些過敏反應會讓你皮膚癢、打噴嚏，但是嚴重的過敏反應有一些人要很小心，會很危險。

content.en: Many people have nut allergies. That's why many foods have a special stamp. It says "May Contain Nuts". It's very easy for nuts to get into food. People with nut allergies need to be very, very careful!
content.tw: 有一些食物都有標示含有堅果，對堅果過敏的人要特別小心。

content.en: A woman was on a plane. She had a very bad nut allergy. The crew was selling snacks. Then she saw WHAT the snacks were … peanuts!!! The woman was scared. Her allergy was very bad. She didn't want people on the plane to have peanuts. So she bought all of them! She bought every peanut on the plane!
content.tw: 這個女士很害怕，她不要飛機上的乘客吃到花生，所以把它們全部買下來。

content.en: The woman spent 6,000 Taiwan dollars on peanuts! But she was safe. If you have allergies, be careful!
content.tw: 這位女士花了 6,000 元台幣買花生！但她很安全。如果你有過敏症，請務必小心！

vocabulary.preface: 對花生過敏的女士，買了飛機上所有的花生。

content.text:
1. sneeze 打噴嚏
Oh, my, this is really bad! 這真是糟糕!
I just can't stop sneezing. 我打噴嚏打個不停。
Is it because of the cold air? 是因為冷空氣嗎?
Probably.可能是。

2. itch 癢
My nose itches and I've got red eyes. 我鼻子癢，還有紅眼睛。
You need to take some medicine. 你需要吃一點藥。

3. spend 花費。
I did. I just spent 600 NT on allergy medicines.
我吃了，剛剛才花了六百塊買過敏藥。
That should take care of it. 那應該可以對付了。

4. fight 對抗。
I wish I could fight it without medicine. 我希望不吃藥就可以對抗。
Get more sleep. That usually helps. 多睡一點，通常很有幫助。

vocabulary.postscript:
These are useful words.
sneeze打噴嚏
itch癢
spend花費
fight對抗

2. What was the crew selling?
3. How much did the woman spend on peanuts?

content.en: What happens in an earthquake? Under our feet, the ground shakes - on the Earth!
What about moonquakes? Yup, the ground shakes on the moon!
content.tw: 發生地震的時候，我們腳下的地球震動。那月震呢? 沒錯，就是月球的地面發生震動!

content.en: Why do moonquakes happen? The moon gets VERY hot during the day. This means it get a little bigger. The moon gets VERY cold at night. It gets a little smaller. The moon changes from hot to cold every afternoon. Moonquakes happen then!
content.tw: 為什麼會發生月震呢? 月球白天非常炎熱，月球會稍微膨脹。而夜晚非常寒冷，月球會因此收縮。每到下午，月球的氣溫從熱到冷，就會發生月震。

content.en: Scientists studied these moonquakes. They found very small moonquakes too. Why do these happen? Well, many years ago, the USA left a big rocket part there...
content.tw: 科學家研究發現月球也會發生一些微小的月震。為什麼會發生呢? 很多年前，美國在月球留下了一大塊的火箭零件。

content.en: It's made of metal. When metal gets very cold, it gets a little smaller. When metal gets very hot, it gets a little bigger. The rocket part changes from cold to hot every morning. Very small moonquakes happen then!
content.tw: 它是金屬做的，金屬會熱脹冷縮。每到早上，火箭零件由冷轉熱，就會發生微小的月震。

content.en: Scientists will take many things to the moon. When the heat and cold change there, what will happen to these things? Scientists will study this. On the moon, big heat and cold changes can make things a little bigger or a little smaller. And they shake the moon!
content.tw: 科學家將帶很多東西到月球。當那裡的熱和冷變化時，這些東西會發生什麼事呢？科學家將研究這個。在月球上，巨大的熱冷變化可以讓物體變大或變小一點。它們還會震動月球！

vocabulary.preface: 地球有地震，月球也有月震，而且是熱脹冷縮造成的。

content.text:
earthquake 地震
What's that? 那是什麼?
Oh no, it's an earthquake! 糟糕，是地震!
Should we run? 我們應該跑嗎?
No, let's hide under the table. 不，來躲到桌子底下。

bigger 更大的
Wow, this one is big! 哇，這個地震好大!
And it's getting bigger! 還更大了。
I wonder what's happening. 我想知道發生了什麼事。

year 年
The TV says it's the biggest earthquake in ten years.
電視上說這是十年來最大的地震。
It's certainly very scary. 真的很嚇人。

shake 震動
My books are all on the floor! 我的書都掉到地上了。
It must be because of the shaking.一定是因為震動的關係。
I was shaking for sure.我剛剛是真的在發抖。

vocabulary.postscript:
Let's read the vocabulary together.
earthquake地震
bigger更大的
year年
shake震動

quiz.question: What happens when the moon gets very hot?
When is the moon very cold?
What makes the very small moonquakes happen?

content.en: People love ordering food online. Food delivery drivers are busy! In India, one delivery driver uses his scooter to deliver food orders. But one day, it needed gas. He went to the gas station.
content.tw: 人們喜歡線上點餐，讓外送員都很忙碌。印度有一位外送員騎機車送訂單。有一天他的機車需要加油，就去了加油站。

content.en: At that time, everyone was worried about gas. Was there enough? Maybe not! So everyone wanted to buy gas. The line at the gas station was very long!
content.tw: 當時大家都很擔心汽油不夠，所以都去買油，讓加油站大排長龍。

content.en: The man waited... three hours! Then he got a new food order. This was a big problem. He didn't want his hungry customer to wait! But his scooter needed gas.
content.tw: 這位外送員一等就是三個小時，但是他有了新訂單，不能讓客人等。

content.en: The man had an idea. He used his friend's horse! He got the food. He put the red delivery bag on his back. Then he rode the horse to deliver the customer's order.
content.tw: 他有個主意，他可以騎朋友的馬送餐! 他騎著馬、揹著紅色外送袋去送客人訂的餐點。

content.en: The road was busy and noisy. But the horse walked calmly.
content.tw: 街道非常吵雜又擁擠，但是馬冷靜地向前走。

content.en: People were amazed to see a delivery driver riding a horse! Some posted pictures online of this unstoppable food delivery driver. He became famous!
content.tw: 路人都很驚訝看到外送員騎馬送訂單，有一些人上傳照片到網路上，讓他一炮而紅。

content.en: His scooter was out of gas, but this delivery driver found a cool way to do his job! Giddyap, horsey!
content.tw: 他的機車沒油了，但這位外送員找到了一個很酷的方法來完成他的工作！駕，小馬！

vocabulary.preface: 騎馬送餐去，真是使命必達。

content.text: 1. famous 著名的 What's that long line for? 那麼長的隊伍在做什麼? Don't you know? That's the famous pancake store. 你不知道嗎?那是有名的鬆餅店。
2. wait 等待 People are lining up for pancakes? 大家為了鬆餅排隊?! Yeah, I once waited one hour standing there. 對啊，我有一次站在那兒等了一個鐘頭。
3. amazed 驚訝的 I'm amazed you'd do something like that. 我很驚訝你會做那種事。 Well, you've never tasted their pancakes. 因為你沒吃過他們的鬆餅。
4. deliver 運送 No, I'm amazed you didn't have it delivered to you. 不，我是驚訝你沒有叫外送。 For pancakes, you have to eat it nice and hot. 鬆餅一定要吃熱呼呼的啊。

vocabulary.postscript: 今天學到哪些單字? famous著名的 wait等待 amazed驚訝的 deliver運送

quiz.question: 1. What is the man's job?
2. How long did the man wait for gas?
3. What was the man's idea?

content.en: Barbers cut people's hair. They work in barbershops.
content.tw: 理髮師幫人剪頭髮，他們在理髮店工作。

content.en: Many people like barbershops. They talk with the barber. They see their friends. They relax and have fun. Oh, and they get a haircut!
content.tw: 很多人喜歡理髮店，可以跟師傅聊天，見見朋友，當然也是為了剪頭髮。

content.en: One day, a teacher went to his barbershop. One of his students came in. But his student didn't have fun. He had nothing to do. He was very bored. He wanted to go!
content.tw: 有一天，一位老師去剪頭髮。他的學生也在那裡。但是這個學生覺得很無聊，想要離開。

content.en: The teacher knew his student. He needed a good book to stop his boredom. Then the teacher had a great idea!
content.tw: 老師知道他的學生需要看書才不會無聊。他想到一個好點子!

content.en: The teacher gave his barbershop many good kids' books. The books were free - and fun! He wanted kids to read at the barbershop. He wanted kids to like reading. And great news! His idea worked very well!
content.tw: 他捐了很多童書給理髮店，希望小朋友可以在理髮店看書，也從此喜歡看書。

content.en: Now he helps over two hundred barbershops! He gives them fun kids' books. The barbers talk with kids about reading too. They ask "Do you like to read?" and "How is that book?" Kids like reading and talking about books there!
content.tw: 現在他已經幫助了兩百多家理髮店！他捐贈有趣的兒童讀物給他們。理髮師們也會和小朋友們談論閱讀。他們會問：「你喜歡閱讀嗎？」和「這本書怎麼樣？」孩子們喜歡在那裡閱讀和談論書籍！

vocabulary.preface: 到理髮店剪頭髮，順便看故事書，很棒的主意!

content.text:
1. haircut 剪頭髮
Hey, you got a new haircut! 嘿，你剪了新髮型!
Looks great on you! 很好看呢!
Really? I did it yesterday. 真的喔? 我昨天剪的。
I'm still not sure if I like it. 我還不確定喜不喜歡。

2. bored 厭煩
So you were just bored with your old look? 所以你就是厭煩了老樣子?
Yeah, I got all sweaty with my long hair. 對啊，長頭髮讓我流好多汗。

3. free 免費的
But the best thing is my haircut was free! 最棒的是，我剪頭髮是免費的。
How is that possible? 怎麼可能?
A free haircut in Taipei? 在台北免費剪頭髮?

4. great 很棒的
It's true! 真的啊。Isn't it great? 不是很棒嗎?
I won a gift voucher in a lucky draw.我在幸運抽獎時抽中了禮券。

vocabulary.postscript:
還記得今天學到哪些單字嗎?
haircut剪頭髮
bored厭煩
free免費的
great很棒的

quiz.question: 1. Who works in a barbershop?
2. What did the student need to stop his boredom?
3. How many barbershops is the teacher helping?

title: Young Amis People Keep the Amis Ways Alive

content.en: In Guangfu Township in Hualien, there is a very old village. It's Taibalang Tribal Village. People of the Amis tribe live there.
content.tw: 花蓮光復的太巴塱（ㄌㄤˇ）部落中住著許多阿美族人。

content.en: The village is next to two rivers. They are full of crabs!
content.tw: 部落旁有兩條河，河中很多螃蟹。

content.en: In the Amis language, "Taibalang" means "crab." The village was named for the crabs in the rivers.
content.tw: 在阿美族語中，太巴塱就是螃蟹的意思。這就是太巴塱部落名字的起源。

content.en: Taibalang has many old wood carvings. These are pictures cut into wood. There are many carvings of crabs!
content.tw: 太巴塱有很多古老的木雕，而且螃蟹圖案的木雕特別多！

content.en: There are also carvings of other animals and people. The people are hunting, fishing, and dancing! The carvings show the ways of the Amis people.
content.tw: 木雕上除了會出現各種動物之外，也會有阿美族人豐富的日常生活！

content.en: Many young people leave the village to work. But every summer, they come back. They help the village get ready for a big festival!
content.tw: 離開部落工作的年輕人會在夏天回來，一起幫忙舉辦祭典。

content.en: Elders teach young people how to help. Everyone has a job to do. They do things the Amis way. Helping the village keeps the ways of the Amis people alive.
content.tw: 部落的長輩負責傳授經驗。這樣子，來幫忙的年輕人才能將阿美族的傳統延續下去。

content.en: Taiwan had some big typhoons this year. Guangfu was flooded. Amis people are going back to help the villages there. Others from all over Taiwan are going too.
content.tw: 今年 ，台灣遭遇了幾次的大颱風。光復被水淹了。阿美族人和來自台灣各地的其他人都去幫助村子！

content.en: Guangfu needs our help now! Let's hope Guangfu gets back to normal soon.
content.tw: 光復現在需要我們的幫助！讓我們希望光復能盡快恢復正常。

vocabulary.preface: 阿美族太巴塱部落，很希望維繫他們的傳統。

content.text:
1. way 方式。
Living in an old village by the river…. 住在河邊的古老村落裡...
Isn't that a nice way of living? 那不是很好的生活方式?

2. hunt 打獵。
I don't know about that. 這我不知道。
People there hunt rabbits and catch crabs?那裏的人獵殺兔子，吃螃蟹?
Why not? 為什麼不可以?

3. young 年輕的。
And older people can teach the young how to do things. 年紀大的可以教導年輕人做事情。
What kinds of things? 做怎樣的事?

4. wood 木頭。
Like…how to make a boat with wood. 比如說怎麼樣用木頭來造船。
So where's this village of yours? 所以你這個村落在哪裡?
I have yet to find it. 我還在找。

vocabulary.postscript: Let's go visit Taibalang Tribe together! 來讀今天的單字。way方式 hunt打獵 young年輕的 wood木頭

quiz.question: 1. What does "Taibalang" mean in Amis language?
2. Where is Taibalang Tribal Village?
3. What are "wood carvings"?

content.en: Big whales swim very far. Every year, they go from cold places to warm places.
content.tw: 鯨魚每年都會從冷的地方游到溫暖海域。

content.en: Some scientists say whales are the gardeners of the ocean. Gardeners grow flowers or food. But how can whales be gardeners?
content.tw: 科學家說，鯨魚就像海洋的園丁一樣。為什麼呢？

content.en: Cold places have lots of very small fish. Whales eat and eat and eat them. Then the whales can swim very far. They swim to warm places.
content.tw: 鯨魚會在冰冷海水中吃很多很多小魚，然後再游到溫暖的地方。

content.en: The warm places don't have lots of small fish. There's not a lot of food for the fish. But that's okay for the whales. They don't eat there. They are busy with their babies.
content.tw: 溫暖的海水沒有小魚吃。不過沒關係，因為鯨魚會在那裏繁殖！

content.en: Oh! The warm water under a whale is turning yellow… But don't say, "EWWWW." There's great food in the water now. Whales make lots of it. Scientists say whales make about four million kilograms of this food every year!
content.tw: 鯨魚底下的水變得黃黃的！那是鯨魚的排泄物，也是一種食物。鯨魚每年會製造四百萬公斤這種食物！

content.en: What happens to this food? Plankton use it! They are very, very small plants and animals. And plankton are very important food for small fish and whales! Whales help the ocean stay full of life. That's why they're called the gardeners of the ocean!
content.tw: 這些食物會怎麼樣呢？浮游生物會利用它們！牠們是非常非常小的植物和動物。浮游生物對小魚和鯨魚來說是非常重要的食物！鯨魚幫助海洋維持生機。這就是牠們被稱為海洋園丁的原因！

vocabulary.preface: 鯨魚在大海中遷徙，也幫助維持生態。

content.text: 1. million 百萬。Did you know that a whale can eat a million tiny fish in one day?你知不知道鯨魚一天就吃掉百萬隻小魚？No, I didn't. 我不知道。But whales are big animals. 不過鯨魚是很大的動物。
2. kilogram 公斤。That's true. 沒錯。A sperm whale can weigh some 55-thousand kilograms.抹香鯨可以重達五萬五千公斤!Wow, that's too heavy! 哇，那太重了!
3. swim 游泳。No, they need the fat. 不，牠們需要脂肪。After all, they have to swim across vast oceans. 畢竟牠們必須游過大洋。
4. very far 很遙遠。That sounds very far. 聽起來很遠呢!Yeah, it is far. 是很遠。

vocabulary.postscript: 來一起讀單字。million百萬 kilogram公斤 swim游泳 very far很遙遠

quiz.question: 1. Where do whales eat lots of small fish?
2. How many kilograms of food do whales make?
3. What are plankton?
options: b. Very small plants and animals

content.en: It was late at night. Somewhere in Taichung, people were sleeping. P.U.!! There was a new, strong, bad smell. People woke up! They smelled it in their houses. They smelled it out on the street. The smell was everywhere!
content.tw: 某一天晚上，一群台中居民從睡夢中驚醒。他們聞到一股奇怪的臭味！

content.en: People thought the smell was cooking gas. It's dangerous! So they called the firemen!
content.tw: 他們以為是瓦斯外洩，所以立刻打電話給消防隊！

content.en: Fire trucks zoomed down the street. Their sirens went "woop woop!" Their lights flashed! Eight firemen jumped out.
content.tw: 一收到通知，消防車跟消防隊員便快速趕到現場。

content.en: Where was the smell coming from? The firemen needed to find out. They knocked on doors. They sniffed. They used a machine that looks for gas. But they did not find any gas.
content.tw: 消防員到處尋找臭味的來源。但即使用了瓦斯偵測器，也沒找到瓦斯味從哪裡來。

content.en: The firemen sniffed and sniffed. Finally, they found where the smell was coming from. It was coming from something on a scooter!
content.tw: 他們聞了好久才發現，臭味是從一台機車散發出來的！

content.en: What was making the bad smell? It was a durian!
content.tw: 原來臭味的源頭是一顆榴槤！

content.en: The durian is called the king of fruits. It is delicious! But it is very smelly! It smells like cooking gas!
content.tw: 榴槤很美味，但也很臭。它的味道聞起來跟瓦斯一樣！

content.en: Everyone saw the durian. What a surprise! They laughed. It was not dangerous. It was a smelly, smelly durian!
content.tw: 大家看到榴槤後都感到很驚訝，然後笑了出來。原來這不是危險的瓦斯外洩，只是一顆又臭又香的榴槤！

vocabulary.preface: 榴槤讓人以為是瓦斯漏氣了。

content.text:
1. everywhere 到處。
What's that smell? 那是什麼氣味? It's everywhere! 到處都是!
I'm pretty sure it's cigarette smoke.我很確定是香菸。

2. street 街道。
Somebody is smoking out on the street.有人在外面街上抽菸。
Oh, I hate that! 真討厭!
Do you want me to yell at him? 你要我對他喊嗎?
No, I'll do it. 不要，我來對他喊。

3. surprise 驚訝。
Hey, hey! Please don't smoke here! 嘿，請你不要在這裡抽菸!
"Sorry!"
Wow, that's a surprise! 哇，真讓我驚訝。

4. look for 尋找。
Indeed, a very polite man. 真的是很有禮貌的人。
We should look for more neighbors like him.我們應該找更多像他那樣的鄰居。

vocabulary.postscript:
今天你學到哪些單字?
everywhere到處 street街道 surprise驚訝 look for尋找

quiz.question: 1. What did people think the bad smell was?
2. How many firemen came to help?
3. Where did the bad smell come from?

title: Team of Teens Gets E-Waste Recycled

content.en: We use many things that need electricity. There are computers, smartphones, TVs, and many more things. When we don't use them anymore, they become e-waste.
content.tw: 我們每天都會用到很多電子產品。電子產品被丟棄就成了電子垃圾。

content.en: Throwing away e-waste makes our land, water, and air dirty. But e-waste can be recycled! Then people can make new things!
content.tw: 電子垃圾會汙染環境，但這些垃圾可以被回收再利用！

content.en: Taiwan is very good at recycling e-waste! But many other places need help.
content.tw: 台灣很會回收電子垃圾喔！

content.en: Dubai is a city in the United Arab Emirates. Like all cities, it has lots of e-waste.
content.tw: 杜拜這個城市位於阿拉伯聯合大公國。他們也有很多電子垃圾。

content.en: A 14-year-old girl helps get Dubai's e-waste recycled. She works with teenagers from six schools.
content.tw: 那裡有個十四歲的女生集合六所學校的學生，一起回收杜拜的電子垃圾。

content.en: The girl and her team ask people for their e-waste. They do this a few times a year. People bring their e-waste to the girl's house. The team sends it to be recycled.
content.tw: 杜拜市民會把電子垃圾帶到這個女生家。接下來，這群學生就會把垃圾送去回收！

content.en: This time, the team got 900 kilograms of e-waste! That's as heavy as two big horses!
content.tw: 他們這一次總共回收了九百公斤的電子垃圾！

content.en: A team of teens is getting e-waste recycled in Dubai! Today is International E-Waste Day. Remember to get your e-waste recycled in Taiwan!
content.tw: 青少年團隊正在杜拜回收電子垃圾！今天是國際電子垃圾日。記得在台灣回收你的電子垃圾！

vocabulary.preface: 手機，電腦之類的產品，裡面很多成分都可以回收再利用。

content.text: 1. team 團隊. My friend's son and his team pick up garbage every weekend. 我朋友的兒子和他的隊伍每個周末都去撿垃圾. On the beach? 去海灘嗎? Yeah. 對.
2. teenager 青少年. How old is he? 他幾歲? Seventeen, I think. 十七歲吧. Teenagers saving the planet. 拯救地球的青少年. That's great! 真棒!
3. school 學校. His school is encouraging it. 他的學校很鼓勵. Of course, it's good for the school and Earth. 當然啦，那對學校跟地球都好.
4. not anymore 不再. We should stop using plastic bags too. 我們也應該停用塑膠袋. Oh, I don't use them anymore. 我都不再用了. Really? 真的嗎?

vocabulary.postscript: 今天的單字你記住了嗎? team團隊 teenager青少年 school學校 not anymore不再
